title.narrative: HMG Technical Assistance for the Tax Modernization Programme

description.narrative: This activity (HMG Technical Assistance for the Tax Modernization Programme) is a component of Tax Modernisation Programme Grant – Corporate Plan 4 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £602,834. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Charles Kendall Group, Coffey International Development. The start date is 01-12-2013 and the end date is 30-11-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
